name: Hackersay-gem
body:
### Add you hacker needs to do is : ``` gem install hackersays```

### And in terminal :

~~~
$ hackersays 

# hackersays 
Use four digits. A new millenium is coming. ~ Jon Bentley (1976)
# hackersays 
There are 10 types of people in the world, those who can read binary, and those who can't. ~ Some hacker
# hackersays 
One who works with their hands is a laborer.One who works with their hands and their mind is a craftsman.One who works with their hands, mind and heart is an artist. ~ Some hacker
# hackersays 
I think there's a world market for about five computers. ~ Thomas J Watson Senior, 1945
# hackersays 
* No technique works if it isn't used.* Ethics change with technology.* "F Ã— S = k" the product of freedom and security is a constant. ~ Niven's laws
~~~
tagline: Best programming and hacker quotes. Ever. On CLL
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
